page.title: 10TRANSPORT IN ROADE
page.content: BUSES ROADE HAS TWO BUS SERVICES.THERE IS A LOCAL SERVICE BETWEEN NORTHAMPTON AND MILTON KEYNES.THERE ARE ABOUT TWELVE BUSES A DAY TO NORTHAMPTON AND ABOUT EIGHT A DAY TO MILTON KEYNES. THERE IS ALSO AN EXPRESS SERVICE FROM NORTHAMPTON TO READING WHICH STOPS IN ROADE.THERE ARE ABOUT SIX COACHES IN EACH DIRECTION. ( BY GARY STIMPSON) TRAINS WE SPENT AN HOUR OR SO LOOKING AT TRAINS GOING THROUGH ROADE.WE SAW 6 GOODS AND 8 PASSENGER TRAINS GOING NORTH.WE ALSO SAW 7 GOODS AND 7 PASSENGER TRAINS GOING SOUTH.NONE STOPPED HERE BECAUSE THE STATION IS CLOSED. ( BY GARY BUTCHART AND SCOTT BARNES.)
